title: Marketing Your Book for Holiday Sales: Build your audience and sell more books this holiday season with tips from successful authors
description: To create this guide, Lulu asked 4,000 of our best-selling independent authors to share advice and best practices that they've learned on their path to sales success.Their top answers and the insights that they provided are included in this free and easy-to-use guide to selling more books in the holiday season, in three simple steps...
author: Various
